title: Ink Flamingos
description: Dee Carmichael, lead singer of the pop sensation The Flamingoes, has been one of Brett Kavanaugh's most dedicated customers at her tattoo shop. When Dee is discovered dead surrounded by ink pots and needles, Brett is branded a suspect.It seems that someone is impersonating Brett. And if she doesn't act fast, the killer is sure to put the dye in dying once again...
author: Karen E. Olson
